TopicTitle: Lowest overhead mod which adds a second launch site.

Articles.Content:
Hello all.

Looking to do a space race type of save. Let me say that I am very near my RAM limit with the amount of mods I have installed on this save, and I have confirmed that my current config is unstable on 64 bit, so that is not an option. I would simply like to add one more launch site, and if possible, have it operate much in the way RSS handles its alternates. I do not wish to have to run RSS to have this ability, and it seems to me that Kerbtown is too bloated, and Extraplanetary launch pads is probably not what I am looking for. Someone must have something for this, but google has not been my friend in this matter.

Thanks in advance!
hyperedit? you can put rockets anywhere on Kerbin with that, as long as you know how to build a tower for it. I've done it before.

Have you look at http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/82785-0-24-x-Kerbin-Side-v0-32-Pick-N-Mix-Bases.

This looks perfect. Didn't know this existed. Thanks so much!
